thread.title: Officials order fantasy sports sites to shut down in Nevada
thread.title_full: Officials order fantasy sports sites to shut down in Nevada

author: KIMBERLY PIERCEALL
title: Officials order fantasy sports sites to shut down in Nevada
text:
Officials order fantasy sports sites to shut down in Nevada Associated Press | 0 comments 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — Daily fantasy sports sites have been dealt a setback with Nevada regulators ordering them out of the state unless they get a gambling license — a decision that's likely to be closely watched by other states that allow gambling. 
DraftKings and FanDuel — sites that have insisted they aren't gambling and have promised to make millionaires out of sports fans — both pulled out of Nevada by Thursday evening. kAm%92E 52JVD 564:D:@? 7C@> E96 }6G252 v2>:?8 r@?EC@= q@2C5 2==@HD 7@C 52:=J 72?E2DJ DA@CED :?
